title: Emerald Bloom Diamond Haar: A Timeless Treasure
materials: South Sea Pearls. Exquisite Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Intricately crafted floral motifs adorned with brilliant cut diamonds. Features two striking emerald pendants: one pear-shaped and one round. The choker style provides a regal and modern touch, while the pearl drops add a touch of traditional elegance (Mutyala Haram effect).
colors: Primarily gold with the vibrant green of the emeralds and the soft white luster of South Sea pearls. The diamonds provide a dazzling white brilliance.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Its modern design also makes it suitable for high-end parties and formal events. A stunning piece for a bride's muhurtham or a milestone anniversary.
description: This diamond choker haaram is a unique blend of traditional and contemporary design. The exquisite craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure a lasting investment. The striking emeralds symbolize prosperity and good fortune, making it a meaningful and beautiful heirloom piece. Own a piece of Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage.
